titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Bow-Church, before the court of aldermen, on March 12, 1689/90 being the fast-day appointed by Their Majesties / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
